author: Newsdesk
title: Kanye West gushes over Bianca Censori in birthday tribute
text:
- ARTISTS
- NEWS
- UNDERGROUND
- TICKET NEWS
- COMPETITION
Kanye West has paid tribute to his “super bad iconic muse” wife Bianca Censori on her birthday.
The Stronger rapper, also known as Ye, took to social media on Saturday to gush over Bianca as she turned 29.
“Happy birthday to the most beautiful super bad iconic muse inspirational talented artist,” Kanye wrote on Instagram as he posted a series of photographs of Bianca to accompany the loving message.
In one snap posted by Kanye, Bianca was seen smiling as she sat on a sofa wearing white furry boots.
Kanye added the caption: “I miss you when I wake up before you”.
He went on to praise Bianca not only for her beauty but for her brains and loyalty too.
“masters degree in architecture 140 IQ,” he added. “loving by my side everyday when half the world turned their backs on me.”
The 46-year-old music star also hailed his partner as the “most amazing step mom” to the four children he shares with his ex-wife Kim Kardashian.
Kanye signed off as he gushed: “I love you so much thank you for sharing your life with me.”
The couple, who are reported to have married in December 2022, celebrated Bianca’s birthday by partying with friends in Las Vegas.
Kanye and Bianca were spotted holding hands as they walked through the Wynn resort and casino on Saturday, with the architectural designer wearing a tiny black bikini top and white skirt.
A video obtained by TMZ showed Bianca blowing out candles on a cake as friends sang happy birthday to her.

author: MarketScreener
title: BYD inaugura una fábrica en Tailandia y fabrica su vehículo de nuevas energías número 8 millones - MarketScreener
text:
El 4 de julio, BYD celebró la inauguración de su planta de Tailandia y la producción de su nuevo vehículo de nuevas energías número 8 millones en Rayong (Tailandia), en lo que debe interpretarse como dos hitos en la expansión global de la empresa. A la ceremonia asistieron Pimphattra Wichaikul, ministra de industria de Tailandia, Han Zhiqiang, embajador de China en Tailandia, Narit Therdsteerasukdi, secretario general de la junta de inversiones de Tailandia y Wang Chuanfu, director y presidente de BYD, entre otros ejecutivos sénior de BYD Group.
Este comunicado de prensa trata sobre multimedia. Ver la noticia completa aquí: https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20240704613152/es/
Ceremony of BYD Thailand Plant Inauguration and Roll-off of BYD's 8 Millionth New Energy Vehicle (Photo: Business Wire)
BYD finalizó su planta de Tailandia, que tiene una capacidad anual de 150.000 vehículos, en apenas 18 meses. Esta planta, que según las estimaciones generará 10.000 empleos, tiene capacidad para procesos de estampación, pintura, soldadura, montaje final y producción de componentes de automóviles. BYD vivió un momento histórico al revelar el modelo Dolphin como su vehículo de nuevas energías número 8 millones.
La ministra Pimphattra Wichaikul no ahorró elogios para las impresionantes contribuciones de BYD al sector de vehículos de nuevas energías: "BYD es un fabricante de automóviles líder mundial y un pionero en la industria de vehículos de nuevas energías de China. La inversión de BYD en Tailandia, junto con su tecnología de producción avanzada, impulsará el desarrollo de la industria de vehículos de nuevas energías en Tailandia y en toda la Asociación de Naciones de Asia Sudoriental".
El embajador Han Zhiqiang destacó los estrechos lazos y la perdurable amistad entre China y Tailandia. Señaló que BYD, un representante de excelencia de la industria global de vehículos de nuevas energías, ha completado su planta de Tailandia y celebrado la producción de su vehículo de nuevas energías número 8 millones. Este hito no solo representa un importante logro para BYD, sino que además marca un nuevo capítulo en la cooperación de mutuo beneficio entre China y Tailandia en el campo de los vehículos de nuevas energías.
En el evento, Wang Chuanfu expresó su agradecimiento a ambos gobiernos, a los clientes de Tailandia y los socios por su inquebrantable apoyo. Destacó el éxito de BYD en el mercado tailandés, al convertirse en el número uno en ventas de vehículos eléctricos puros durante dieciocho meses seguidos en los últimos dos años. Actualmente, uno de tres vehículos eléctricos vendidos en Tailandia pertenece a BYD. Con vistas al futuro, el objetivo de BYD es lanzar más vehículos eléctricos puros y conectables híbridos en Tailandia.
Como líder global en vehículos de nuevas energías, BYD ha ampliado significativamente su presencia en el extranjero en los últimos años. En 2023, logró un aumento interanual del 337 % en las exportaciones hasta alcanzar los 243.000 vehículos. En la última mitad de este año, BYD vendió 1607 millones de vehículos de nuevas energías en todo el mundo, un aumento interanual del 28 %, para solidificar su posición como el actor más importante de la industria. De esos vehículos, 203.000 se exportaron, lo que representa un crecimiento interanual del 173,8 %. Hasta la fecha, los vehículos de nuevas energías de BYD tienen presencia en 88 países y regiones a nivel mundial, y la producción de autos para pasajeros cuenta con plantas en Tailandia, Brasil, Hungría, y Uzbekistán.
Desde el logro que representó la producción de su vehículo de nuevas energías número 1 millón en mayo de 2021, BYD ha alcanzado el impresionante hito de 8 millones de vehículos en apenas tres años. Con vistas al futuro, BYD seguirá ampliando su presencia en mercados globales y desarrollando su tecnología avanzada y sus productos innovadores para satisfacer las distintas necesidades de consumidores en todo el mundo. A medida que más plantas comiencen a operar en todo el mundo, la capacidad de producción global de BYD se fortalecerá paulatinamente para solidificar aún más su posición de liderazgo en el mercado de vehículos de nuevas energías.
Acerca de BYD
BYD es una empresa multinacional de alta tecnología dedicada a aprovechar las innovaciones tecnológicas para una vida mejor. Fundada en 1995 como fabricante de baterías recargables, BYD cuenta ahora con una amplia gama de negocios que abarca automóviles, transporte ferroviario, nuevas energías y electrónica, con más de 30 parques industriales en China, Estados Unidos, Canadá, Japón, Brasil, Hungría e India. Desde la generación y el almacenamiento de energía hasta sus aplicaciones, BYD se dedica a ofrecer soluciones energéticas de emisiones cero que reducen la dependencia mundial de los combustibles fósiles. Su huella de vehículos de nueva energía abarca ya 6 continentes, más de 70 países y regiones y más de 400 ciudades. Cotiza en las bolsas de Hong Kong y Shenzhen y es conocida por ser una empresa incluida en la lista Fortune Global 500 que aporta innovaciones en pos de un mundo más verde.
Acerca de BYD Auto
Fundada en 2003, BYD Auto es la subsidiaria automotriz de BYD, una empresa de alta tecnología multinacional que se dedica a impulsar innovaciones tecnológicas para una vida mejor. Con el objetivo de acelerar la transición ecológica del sector de transporte global, la misión de BYD Auto es desarrollar vehículos híbridos eléctricos puros y conectados híbridos. La empresa domina completamente las tecnologías principales de toda la cadena industrial de vehículos de nuevas energías, como baterías, motores eléctricos y controladores electrónicos. En los últimos años, ha sido testigo de importantes avances tecnológicos, entre ellos la batería Blade, la tecnología superhíbrida DM-i, ePlatform 3.0, la tecnología CTB, e⁴ Platform, el sistema de control de carrocería inteligente BYD DiSus y el sistema superhíbrido DMO. La empresa es la primera fabricante de automóviles a nivel mundial en detener la producción de vehículos alimentados con combustibles fósiles ante el cambio a vehículos eléctricos, y conserva el primer lugar en ventas de vehículos de pasajeros de nuevas energías en China durante 11 años consecutivos.
Para obtener más información, visite www.byd.com.
El texto original en el idioma fuente de este comunicado es la versión oficial autorizada. Las traducciones solo se suministran como adaptación y deben cotejarse con el texto en el idioma fuente, que es la única versión del texto que tendrá un efecto legal.

author: Gabriella Phelan
title: Flu cases see nearly 25% rise across Arkansas
text:
KNWA Fayetteville Flu cases see nearly 25% rise across Arkansas Gabriella Phelan Thu, December 19, 2024 at 9:37 PM UTC 2 min read
FAYETTEVILLE, Ark. (KNWA/KFTA) — Arkansas has seen a nearly 25% rise in Influenza cases during the second week of December.
According to the Arkansas Department of Health, from Dec. 8 to Dec. 14, more than 165 total cases, 10 hospitalizations, and one death were reported.
One local pharmacist says seeing an uptick this early in the year is unusual, but not surprising.
“We’re seeing a peak right now. But, you know, we’re really just getting into the Christmas season. So, a lot of people are going to be traveling and going to other parts of the country,” said Caul Corbell, pharmacist at Live Well Pharmacy in Fayetteville. “There’s no set standard on when it’s going to peak throughout the season. So, it’s a little bit earlier than usual from what I’ve seen in the past.”
Advertisement Advertisement Advertisement Since Sept. 29, 873 cases of various different types of flu have been reported to the ADH.
Alice Walton aims to change healthcare in Northwest Arkansas
Corbell says although the peak time to get your vaccines has passed, he still encourages people to take that safety measure.
“Most of the vaccine traffic has slowed at this point because usually the vaccines come out in early September. A lot of times people are getting those vaccines in September and October,” Corbell said. “I always like to encourage people and say it’s never too late. Vaccines are typically covered at a $0 copay on most insurances.”
Advertisement Advertisement Advertisement Between December and April, Corbell says the pharmacy will dispense all kind of medications, but one stands out amongst the rest.
“Between now and April will be when we see the most of our dispensing of flu medications,” Corbell said.
However, he says five minutes of time can keep you protected.
“We can get you in and out in less than 5 minutes here. So, it’s quick and easy. It’s convenient, and it’s by far the best way to prevent getting the flu,” Corbell said. “It introduces an antigen into your body, such to elicit a response from your immune system that helps your immune system create antibodies that if it’s then encountered with the actual flu virus, it already has the antibodies built up in store to fight off the virus.”

author: @zupyak.com
title: Why Regular Roof Inspections Are Crucial for South Bend Homes
text:
Introduction
Maintaining a home involves many aspects, but one of the most critical yet often overlooked is regular roof inspections.
In South Bend, where the weather can be unpredictable and severe, ensuring your roof is in top condition is essential for the safety and longevity of your home.
The Importance of Regular Roof Inspections
Prevents Major Damage
Regular roof inspections help identify minor issues before they turn into major problems. Small leaks, damaged shingles, or other minor damages, if left unattended, can lead to significant structural damage over time. By addressing these issues early, homeowners can prevent costly repairs and extend the lifespan of their roof.
Protects Against Weather Elements
South Bend experiences a wide range of weather conditions, from heavy snowfall in winter to severe thunderstorms in summer. These weather elements can take a toll on your roof, causing wear and tear. Regular inspections ensure your roof can withstand these conditions, protecting your home from potential water damage, mold, and mildew.
Enhances Energy Efficiency
A well-maintained roof contributes to your home's energy efficiency. Damaged or improperly insulated roofs can lead to heat loss in winter and increased cooling costs in summer. Regular inspections help identify and rectify these issues, ensuring your home remains energy-efficient and reducing your utility bills.
Ensures Safety
A damaged roof can pose serious safety risks to the occupants of the house. Loose shingles, water leaks, and structural weaknesses can lead to accidents and health hazards. Regular inspections help in identifying these risks and ensuring your roof is safe and secure.
Increases Property Value
For homeowners planning to sell their property, a well-maintained roof can significantly enhance the value of the home. Prospective buyers are more likely to invest in a property that has a robust and well-maintained roof. Regular inspections and timely repairs can boost your home's market value.
Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)
How often should I have my roof inspected?
It is recommended to have your roof inspected at least twice a year, preferably in the spring and fall. Additionally, inspections should be conducted after any major weather event such as a severe storm, hail, or heavy snowfall.
What are the signs that my roof needs an inspection?
Common signs include missing or damaged shingles, water stains on your ceiling or walls, visible mold or mildew, and an increase in energy bills. If you notice any of these signs, it’s crucial to schedule a roof inspection immediately.
Can I perform a roof inspection myself?
While you can perform a basic visual inspection from the ground, it is advisable to hire a professional for a thorough inspection. Professionals have the expertise to identify issues that may not be visible to the untrained eye and can safely access all areas of the roof.
How much does a roof inspection cost?
The cost of a roof inspection can vary depending on the size of your home and the extent of the inspection. On average, a professional roof inspection can cost between $100 and $300. However, this investment can save you thousands in potential repairs.
What should I do if my roof needs repairs?
If an inspection reveals the need for repairs, it is important to address them promptly. Ignoring necessary repairs can lead to more extensive damage. Contact a professional roofing contractor to discuss the necessary repairs and obtain an estimate.
How can I maintain my roof between inspections?
Regularly clean your gutters, trim overhanging branches, and remove debris from your roof. Additionally, inspect your attic for signs of leaks or water damage. Taking these steps can help maintain your roof’s condition between professional inspections.
Conclusion
Regular roof inspections are a crucial aspect of home maintenance, especially in a city like South Bend with its diverse weather conditions. By staying proactive and addressing potential issues early, homeowners can protect their investment, enhance their home’s safety and energy efficiency, and maintain its value. Prioritize regular roof inspections to ensure your home remains a safe and comfortable haven for years to come.

author: Julia Teti
title: Skims Unveils Valentine's Day Pop-up Store in NYC With Fan-favorite Collections, Exclusives and More
text:
Skims unveiled the brand’s new pop-up shop in New York City’s SoHo neighborhood on Thursday. The American shapewear and clothing brand, cofounded by Kim Kardashian and Jens Grede, features an immersive experience, where shoppers can browse selections from the brand’s Valentine’s Day collection and more.
Skims’ Valentine’s Day pop-up opens just in time for the holiday. The SoHo store features an allover Cherry Blossom pink tone, mimicking one of the ubiquitous colors of the holiday. Throughout the store, which was designed in partnership with Something Special Studios, shoppers can find curated pieces from the brand’s latest collection.
The signature soft, rounded edges, glossy finishes and heart-inspired motifs throughout the pop-up store provide an aesthetic nod to Skims’ own look and feel. The pop-up features 12 Valentine’s Day-inspired collections.
You May Also Like
Among the finds in the pop-up, which will remain open beginning Thursday and enjoy its final day on Sunday, shoppers will find fan-favorite collections like Skims Romance, Stretch Lace, Soft Lounge, Skims Sleep, Fits Everybody and more.
The pop-up offers a bevy of selection for each shopper’s Valentine’s Day moment. Visitors can also indulge in custom-made treats available exclusively in-store.
On Thursday, Skims debuted the brand’s 2025 Valentine’s Day campaign starring Blackpink’s Rosé. The collection boasts velvet slipdresses and lace-trimmed pajamas emblazoned with festive graphics, among other designs.
“Valentine’s Day has always held a special place in my heart,” Rosé said in a statement. “Maybe it’s also because it’s only a few days after my birthday, it feels special to me, almost like a second round of a birthday. This collection captures that feeling with pieces that are both romantic and cute. I had an amazing time shooting this campaign, and I hope everyone feels as confident and beautiful in these pieces as I did.”

author: NY Weekly Staff
title: Lily Liu: Shaping the Future of Language Education in the Age of Artificial Intelligence
text:
By: Maddie Evans
Last year, Lily Liu’s two scientific achievements, namely the AI-BASED EDUCATION SYSTEM and the AI-POWERED LANGUAGE LEARNING AND ADAPTIVE EDUCATION PLATFORM, were recognized with certificates of registration by the Canadian Intellectual Property Office. In an era where artificial intelligence (AI) is increasingly influencing industries across the globe, education stands out as one of the fields experiencing significant transformation. From potentially personalized learning experiences to immersive virtual classrooms, AI-driven technologies are beginning to redefine how knowledge is acquired, shared, and retained.
At the forefront of this educational evolution is Lily Liu, a visionary leader whose innovative work in intelligent language education has contributed to raising standards for language teaching and learning. With over two decades of experience, Lily has skillfully integrated cutting-edge AI technologies with thoughtful pedagogical strategies, helping to make language education more dynamic, accessible, and potentially more effective. Her journey from a traditional language educator to a global innovator in smart education illustrates the transformative potential of AI in shaping the future of language education.
Academic Foundations and Multidisciplinary Expertise
Lily Liu’s academic trajectory reflects a careful and strategic accumulation of expertise across multiple disciplines, which has played a key role in shaping her innovative approach to language education. She began her academic journey at Henan University, where she earned an undergraduate diploma in Chinese Language and Literature in 1999. This foundational training in linguistics and literature provided her with a solid understanding of the structural and cultural nuances of language, which later informed her development of AI-driven language learning systems.
Her pursuit of advanced studies in English Language and Literature at Beijing Language and Culture University further expanded her linguistic repertoire, while her concurrent role as a Chinese language instructor for international students offered her firsthand insights into the challenges faced by non-native learners. Recognizing the potential importance of cognitive development in effective language acquisition, Lily pursued a postgraduate diploma in Child Psychology Education from the Chinese Academy of Sciences. This multidisciplinary background—combining linguistics, pedagogy, and psychology—provided her with a holistic understanding of the cognitive and emotional factors that may influence learning outcomes.
Lily’s academic journey culminated in a Master of Arts in Interpreting and Translation Studies from Wake Forest Graduate School of Art & Science, which offered her international exposure and a nuanced understanding of cross-cultural communication. This diverse educational foundation has been instrumental in her ability to design language learning systems that are not only technologically advanced but also pedagogically sound and culturally sensitive.
Bridging Pedagogical Tradition with Technological Innovation
Lily Liu’s career is characterized by her unique ability to blend traditional pedagogical principles with state-of-the-art technological innovations. In 2016, she founded the Beijing Little Lotus Children’s Development Center, an institution dedicated to reimagining after-school education through creative and interdisciplinary approaches. By integrating storytelling, science experiments, and traditional academic subjects, Lily created a learning environment that aimed to foster curiosity, critical thinking, and cultural appreciation among young learners. This early venture helped lay the groundwork for her subsequent foray into the development of intelligent language learning systems.
Lily’s most notable contributions to the field of language education include her work in AI-driven learning technologies. She has developed a suite of innovative tools, including the Immersive Language Learning Experience System Based on VR Technology and the Chinese Pronunciation Training System Using Speech Recognition. These systems leverage natural language processing (NLP) and adaptive learning algorithms to offer highly personalized and interactive learning experiences. By simulating real-world language environments and providing real-time feedback, these tools aim to address critical challenges in language acquisition, such as pronunciation accuracy, contextual understanding, and conversational fluency.
Her work has been particularly notable in addressing the limitations of traditional language instruction, which often faces challenges in providing individualized attention and immersive practice opportunities. Lily’s systems enable learners to potentially engage in authentic language interactions within virtual environments, thereby aiming to enhance both their linguistic proficiency and cultural competence. This innovative approach has shown promise in improving learning outcomes and expanding access to high-quality language education, particularly for learners in remote or underserved regions.
Global Impact and Industry Recognition
Lily Liu’s contributions to the field of language education have garnered widespread recognition and numerous accolades. Notably, she was honored as a Pioneering Figure in Scientific and Technological Innovation in Smart Language Education during China’s 14th Five-Year Plan period, a recognition of her leadership in the integration of AI and education. Her influence extends beyond her technological achievements; as the Publicity Director of the North Carolina Chinese-American Friendship Association (CAFA), she has been actively involved in promoting cultural exchange and fostering mutual understanding between China and the United States.
In addition to her work in education technology, Lily has made notable contributions to cross-cultural communication through her translation and localization projects. Her localization of the Jobbly website into Simplified Chinese and her translation of literary works demonstrate her ability to navigate the complexities of linguistic and cultural adaptation. These endeavors not only highlight her linguistic expertise but also reflect her commitment to bridging cultural divides through language.
Lily Liu: A Leader in Advancing Education Technology
Lily Liu’s work represents a significant step forward in language education, showcasing the transformative potential of artificial intelligence to potentially enhance learning outcomes and expand access to education. Her ability to effectively integrate technological innovation with pedagogical excellence has established her as a leading figure in the field. As the world continues to grapple with the challenges of globalization and digital transformation, Lily’s visionary leadership offers valuable insights into harnessing the power of technology to create a more connected, inclusive, and equitable educational landscape. Through her dedication to innovation and her commitment to fostering cross-cultural understanding, Lily Liu is helping to shape the future of language education and redefining the possibilities of technology in smart education worldwide.
Published by Stephanie M.
topics: Science and Technology->information technology and computer science
